title: Interaction of disposable face mask (nano)microplastics with antibiotics: performance and mechanisms
content:

DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00775H, Paper

The adsorption of ciprofloxacin (CIP), sulfamethoxazole (SMX) and tetracycline (TC) on disposable face mask (nano-)microplastics occurs in the order SMX > CIP > TC, which correlates with the octanolâ€“water partition coefficient of antibiotics.
